desc: 攻撃ＢＢの威力をかなりアップ＆攻撃力を２０％アップ

dictionary.lore: The giant axe of Barbatos, a bloodthirsty warrior from another world. Boasting of incredible strength, no armor or shield can withstand its amazing brute force. Rumor has it that any foe struck by this axe is immediately shredded into pieces. However, wielding this axe requires such formidability that it makes it almost impossible for any average warrior to master it.

name: ディアボリックファング
